name: Clumsy Clops
description:
Clumsy Clops

Take control of a destructive cyclops, trying their best not to leave a trail of ruination as they rush through a quint little village of cute critters. Or let go of your moral compass and rack up your score of lives ruined, the choice is yours!

Credits:

Programming: A yellow brick

Graphics: 2 Goblins we found on the street

Design & concept art: Doctor D-man Dongalicious

Sounds: Sounds Undertale

Screenshots:

Created for Nordic Game Jam 2023
The theme of the jam was given to us by taking a survey and receiving prompts. Our prompts were:

  • Cyclops
  • Sounds
  • Brittleness
